tool_description: Public docs/blogs written by manirabona patience, for different technologies,. tech stack, solutions code snipets from wide different angles.
name: Patienceman-docs
title: Patienceman-docs

api_list.name: All tags/Topics
api_list.description: Get all used topics from all blogs
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://patienceman-docs1.p.rapidapi.com/public/doc-tags"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "patienceman-docs1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
